location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter outlines the new arrangements and allowances set out for the Bushire Residency. It further includes a request from William Bruce that he be considered for the post of Resident at Bushire, owing to the amount of time he has served at that station, and the amount of time he has been in charge of the Residency.
